::Magmatron:: 

    Magmatron put his hand to his own head and then to CyberShark's head, 
unknown to all he inserted a data track. It held information for this very 
thing. (The spiders couldn't have known because it was made in Magmatron's 
head.   
"I have known of these creatures since they entered my base. I am aware of 
every molecule of this ship, nothing goes on without my knowing it." The Data 
track read. "Go about business as usual. If any more of those bugs show up, 
treat them as common insects, not as robots."
    "Have you told anybody else this?" Magmatron asked.
    "No, I thought you should know first," CyberShark said.
    "Good, nobody else needs to be bothered with a simple infestation. I 
wouldn't worry about the bugs CyberShark, they are of no threat to us, just 
harmless spiders really." Magmatron hit a sour note with the word 'spiders'.
